CatDescriptText: The Lemington Home for the Aged was established in 1900 as the first home for elderly black women in Western Pennsylvania.  It was located at 7091 Lemington Avenue in Pittsburgh's Lincoln-Lemington-Belmar neighborhood.
TitMainTitle: Three elderly women on porch of the Lemington Home for the Aged, 7081 Lemington Avenue
